alert.note: Alert for Cheyenne; Morrill (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 05 at 5:44PM CDT until July 05 at 6:15PM CDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: The National Weather Service in Cheyenne has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Cheyenne County in the Panhandle of Nebraska... Southeastern Morrill County in the Panhandle of Nebraska... * Until 515 PM MDT. * At 443 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near The Intersection Of Highway 385 And 92 to near Gurley to near Lorenzo, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Sidney, Lodgepole, Dalton, Gurley, Colton, Sunol, Brownson, Lorenzo and Sidney Airport. This includes Interstate 80 in Nebraska between mile markers 51 and 77. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
